name: Divorce Quest
description:
You conquered the Final Fantasy... Survived the Dragon Age...  Explored Skyrim...

Are you ready for the next world changing RPG that will be remembered for future generations to come???

Good, me too. 

This game isn't it tho. This one is about being divorced and living in a hotel. 

Features:

  • Stunningly realistic environments
  • Frenetic, but engrossing turn based combat
  • Photo-realistic characters
  • Branching story (you can quit the game at any time and not continue the story)
